name: PropertyPlaceHolder
description: Insert a spring property placeholder in xml config file
code:
<!-- place holder config beans : mandatory to load acl context -->
 <bean id="placeholderConfig" class="org.springframework.beans.factory.config.PropertyPlaceholderConfigurer">
  <property name="locations">
   <list>
    <value>classpath:META-INF/${fileName}/</value>
   </list>
  </property>
 </bean>
